name: twineedle
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
